text:
Toronto - OANDA (http://www.oanda.com)

HTML5 / Javascript Web Developer

We are looking for amazing web developers to help us build a new HTML5 trading platform that rivals any desktop offering.

If you believe that future of applications is HTML5 and the Web and you want to work in downtown Toronto with a bunch of fun, passionate developers then we want to hear from you.

Email: paul@oanda.com
